History

Woodco Prefinishing began in 1984, as one of the first prefinishing companies in North America specializing in interior doors and trim. Through the years, continuous refinements to our processes, equipment and technology have produced top quality products that are second to none.

© 2025 Woodco Prefinishing. All rights reserved.
